tool_description: You can make profile and post searches with stable, highly maintained API
name: Linkedin Public Search
title: Linkedin Public Search

api_list.name: peoplesearch
api_list.description: Search peoples with name and surname keywords

api_list.name: postsearch

optional_parameters.name: datePosted
optional_parameters.description:
You can search posts with posted date filters. Here you can use datePosted values:
- past-24h
- past-week
- past-month

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: post count in every page, default value is 10, max value is 50

api_list.name: companysearch
